sentences.en: The Frenchman held his own against the challenger.
sentences.cn: 那个法国人顶住了挑战者的攻击。

sentences.en: Robert Millar finished 1 minute and 35 seconds ahead of the Frenchman.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特·米拉尔领先法国选手1分35秒完成比赛。

sentences.en: To speak robin to a robin is like speaking French to a Frenchman.
sentences.cn: 对知更鸟说知更鸟的语言，就像对法国人说法语。
